# Credentials Test Fixture
# Contains FAKE placeholder credentials for testing detection patterns
# All values use FAKEFAKE/00000 patterns to avoid triggering secret scanners

# ===== Password Assignments =====
# Generic password patterns
password = "FakePassword123!"
passwd: "FakeP@ssw0rd2024"
pwd = "AnotherFakePassword456"

# Password field patterns
password_field = "F@keV@lue!!"
user_passwd = "FakePassword789"
db_pass: "FakeDbPassword#2024"

# Secret assignments
secret = "ThisIsFakeSecretValue123"
secret_key: "FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAK"
secretkey = "FakeApplicationSecretKey!!"

# ===== Database Connection Strings =====
# PostgreSQL
postgres://fakeuser:fakepassword123@localhost:5432/fakedb
postgresql://fakeadmin:FakeSecret456@db.example.com/fakeproduction
DATABASE_URL=postgres://fakeuser:f@keP@ss@postgres.internal:5432/fake_db

# MySQL
mysql://fakeroot:fakemysqlpassword@localhost:3306/fake_db
mysql://fakeappuser:FakeSecr3tP@ss@mysql.example.com/fakewebapp

# MongoDB
mongodb://fakeadmin:fakemongopass123@localhost:27017/faketestdb
mongodb+srv://fakeuser:fakepassword123@cluster.mongodb.net/fakeproduction

# Redis
redis://localhost:6379/0
redis://fakeuser:fakeredispassword@redis.internal:6379/1

# MSSQL
Server=sqlserver.example.com;Database=fakedb;User Id=fakesa;Password=FakeSqlPass123;
Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=FakeTestDB;Pwd=FakeSqlPassword!;

# JDBC
jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/fakedb?user=fakeadmin&password=fakejdbcpassword123
jdbc:postgresql://db.example.com/fakeprod?password=FakeJdbcP@ssword456

# Generic database URL
database_url = "postgres://fakeadmin:fakedbsecret@db.internal:5432/fakeapp"
db_connection = "mysql://fakeuser:fakepass123@mysql.local/fakedatabase"

# ===== HTTP Authentication =====
# Basic Auth Header (using FAKEFAKE base64)
Authorization: Basic RkFLRVVTRVI6RkFLRVBBU1NXT1JE
auth = "Basic RkFLRUFETUlOOkZBS0VTRUNSRVQ="

# Bearer Token Header
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImZha2UiOnRydWV9.eyJzdWIiOiJmYWtlIn0.fakesignature
auth: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImZha2UiOnRydWV9.eyJpc3MiOiJmYWtlIn0.fakesig"

# ===== JWT Tokens =====
# Standalone JWT (with fake=true in header to mark as test)
token = "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImZha2UiOnRydWV9.eyJ1c2VySWQiOjF9.fakesignature"

# JWT in assignment
jwt_token = "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImZha2UiOnRydWV9.eyJzdWIiOiJmYWtlIn0.fakesig"
access_token = "eyJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiIsImZha2UiOnRydWV9.eyJpc3MiOiJmYWtlLWlzc3VlciJ9.fakesig"
id_token: "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImZha2UiOnRydWV9.eyJhdWQiOiJmYWtlY2xpZW50In0.fakesig"

# ===== OAuth Tokens =====
oauth_access_token = "ya29.FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"
oauth_token: "1/FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"

# OAuth Client Secret
oauth_client_secret = "FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"
client_secret: "0000000000000000000000000000"

# Refresh Token
refresh_token = "1//FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"
refresh_token: "RT_FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAK"

# ===== Generic API Tokens =====
api_token = "tok_FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFA"
auth_token: "at_00000000000000000000000000"
authentication_token = "auth-FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFA"
access_token = "acc_FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAK"

# ===== URL with Credentials =====
# HTTP URLs with embedded credentials
https://fakeadmin:fakepassword@api.example.com/v1/data
http://fakeuser:fakepass123@internal-service.local:8080/api
ftp://fakeftpuser:fakeftppass456@files.example.com/uploads

# ===== .env File Patterns =====
SECRET_KEY = "django-insecure-FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"
API_KEY=FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE
AUTH_TOKEN=auth_FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAK
TOKEN_SECRET: "fake-application-token-secret"

DATABASE_URL=postgres://fakeuser:fakepass@localhost/fakedb
DB_CONNECTION = "mysql://fakeroot:fakesecret@mysql:3306/fakeapp"

PASSWORD=FakeSecretPassword123
DB_PASSWORD=FakeDatabaseP@ssw0rd!
MYSQL_PASSWORD: "FakeMysqlRootPassword"
REDIS_PASSWORD=FakeRedisSecretPass456

# ===== Docker Registry Auth =====
# Docker auth field
{
  "auth": "RkFLRVVTRVJOQU1FOkZBS0VQQVNTV09SRA=="
}

# Docker config.json structure
{
  "auths": {
    "https://index.docker.io/v1/": {
      "auth": "RkFLRUFETUlOOkZBS0VTRUNSRVQ="
    }
  }
}

# ===== Session and Cookie Secrets =====
session_secret = "fake-session-secret-key-12345"
cookie_secret: "fake-cookie-signing-secret-value"
SESSION_SECRET=FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE

# ===== LDAP Credentials =====
# LDAP URL with credentials
ldap://cn=fakeadmin,dc=example,dc=com:fakeadminpassword@ldap.example.com
ldaps://uid=fakebinduser,ou=users,dc=corp,dc=local:fakebindpass@ldap.corp.local

# LDAP Bind Password
ldap_bind_password = "FakeLdapBindP@ssword123"
bind_password: "FakeBindUserSecret456"
ldap_password = "FakeDirectoryP@ss789"
